title: Teen Sons & Substance Abuse
itunes:author: Guest: Jonathan McKee
itunes:summary:
Many kids and teens today are being influenced by things they see on social media. While it has it's good sides, social media can also cause your child to compare themselves with others. John and Danny share how you can encourage your child to be more outward focused in a world driven by screens. Featuring Jonathan McKee.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast, or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Receive Jonathan's book "The Guy's Guide to Four Battles Every Young Man Must Face" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofp-podcast-2022-02-22?refcd=1346503

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-parenting-podcast/teen-sons-substance-abuse/#featured-resource-cta

Listen Anytime: https://store.focusonthefamily.com/championing-your-son-through-his-battles-digital-product?refcd=1346503

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
